mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: But? What's on your mind, Sarah?

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (hesitantly) Mark, I might have seen something that night...

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: Something important? You know you can trust me with this.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: A man in a red tie and a suit? Do you remember his face?

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (shakes her head) No, not really. But I remember the feeling of alarm I had when I saw him leave.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (thoughtfully) Hmm. This could potentially be an important lead. I need to tell Emily about this. But I also need to know if there is a potential alibi for her during the time of the poisoning.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (surprised) An alibi? You think there is one?

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: Yes, Sarah. I'm exploring every possibility. And I'll keep you updated on anything I find out.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (gulps) Alright, Mark. I trust you to handle this.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (smiling) Thank you, Sarah. I promise to do everything in my power to clear Emily's name.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Sarah Reynolds
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: (relieved) I believe you, Mark. Good luck with your investigation.

mark_emily_dialogue.speaker: Mark Turner
mark_emily_dialogue.utterance: Thank you, Sarah. I'll be in touch. (pauses) By the way, have you heard from Emily or Richard lately? I need to speak with both of them about this new development.

Mark recognizes the need to follow up on this lead by speaking with Emily and Richard about the sighting and their potential alibis for the night in question.
